title: #555 - Tom Rhodes
description:
Tom Rhodes, a comedian for more than 30 years and the host of the "Tom Rhodes Radio," podcast, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt LIVE in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by:

eharmony - Enter code CHURCH at checkout for a free month when you sign up for a 3 month subscription. eharmony brings compatible people together.

Recorded live on 01/31/2018.
